page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: We surveyed Morview Estate to find out information about the people who live there and the way they live.We did not get replies from everyone,but we got some interesting facts. Almost every house has a car.We expected this because people without a car would probably not buy a house at Widegates. There are two buses each day to Looe and two to Plymouth. Almost everyone said they would like a better service of public transport.More than half of the houses we surveyed were occupied by people who are retired from work. They had come to live there because they lived in the area and wanted a new house to retire into,or because they like the climate and counytryside of Cornwall.
